text: int main ( ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { int a [ n ] [ n ] ; int i , j ; for ( i = n ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; else a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
